wishText: I want to make a wish on your birthday,whatever you ask may you receive, whatever you seek may you find, whatever you ask may it be fulfilled on yout birthday and always. Happy Birthday!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Cheers to another year of wonderful adventures!
